events.message: I want to request a refund for the jacket I bought last week. It didn't meet my expectations and I need to return it as soon as possible.
The customer's request clearly indicates a refund issue related to a recent purchase that they want to return.
The refund case has been assigned to a customer service agent specialized in returns and refunds.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m here to assist you with your refund request for the jacket purchase.
Could you please provide the order number and let us know if the jacket has been worn or damaged in any way? This will help us process your refund.
The order number is 12345678. I only tried the jacket on once and it is in perfect condition, just didn’t fit well.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate the refund process immediately. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid shipping label we will email you shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate the help and will send the jacket back today.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund to the original payment method. Please allow 3-5 business days for the amount to reflect.
Just checking in to confirm if the refund has appeared in your account and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, I received the refund today. Everything is perfect now. Thanks again for your help!
We are glad to hear that your refund was received. Your case is now closed. Have a great day!
Please take a moment to complete a short survey about your experience with our refund process. Your feedback helps us improve.
I completed the survey and rated the service as excellent. Very satisfied with the support.
The refund support case for order 12345678 has been archived per standard data retention policies.
